metadata.name: end_drag_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests END_DRAG opcode (0x28) - stops dragging sprite/MovieClip. Comprehensively tests: END_DRAG when nothing is dragging (safe no-op), START_DRAG followed by END_DRAG (proper state management), and multiple END_DRAG calls (idempotent behavior).
missing_features: Graphics rendering: actual sprite/MovieClip drag visualization requires SDL3/Vulkan
Mouse interaction: drag positioning based on mouse input requires graphics mode
Display list integration: finding and updating sprites in the display list
